delete.question:
Are you sure you want to delete the module with identifier
{{ id }}?

A.1.name: Respect SLA availability of payment service
A.1.description: The SLAs indicated in the 'Service Availability' section must not be violated. During the analysis period, the total number of timeouts must not exceed a percentage threshold relative to the total number of primitive executions

A.2.name: Accurate taxonomy
A.2.description: The association of all payments with a taxonomic code present in the list published in the SANP must be guaranteed

B.1.name: Number of intermediated entities or managed transactions
B.1.description: Intermediation of over 5 entities or at least 250,000 transactions is required during the reference period

B.2.name: Respect SLA response times of primitives
B.2.description: The SLAs indicated in the 'Service Availability' section must not be violated. During the analyzed period, the percentage of responses exceeding a predetermined time must not exceed a certain percentage relative to the total number of requests

B.3.name: Zero Incidents
B.3.description: No events should occur that trigger the activation of Stand In

B.4.name: Integration via asynchronous/synchronous APIs
B.4.description: During the analysis period, the transfer of debt positions to the Centralized Notification Archive ('ACA') must be guaranteed

B.5.name: Use of spontaneous payment features
B.5.description: The functionality for managing spontaneous payments on all operational stations of the Technology Partner must be kept active and functional

B.6.name: Payment options
B.6.description: The functionality for managing payment options on all operational stations of the Technology Partner must be kept active and functional

B.7.name: Compliance with the latest SANP version
B.7.description: Compliance with SANP/SACI specifications is required for at least 50% of intermediated entities

B.8.name: Compliance with formal requirements for asynchronous integration
B.8.description: Compliance with formal validation requirements is required for at least 95% of debt positions loaded via asynchronous APIs

B.9.name: Correct management of payment receipts
B.9.description: At least 95% of positive outcomes to the primitive paSendRT (outcome OK in the response) must be achieved during the reference period

C.1.name: Native integration with IO
C.1.description: Verify the transmission of the respective message for each debt position on IO, along with communications and payment notices, for at least 50% of intermediaries

C.2.name: Native integration with SEND
C.2.description: Verify the activation of the SEND notification cost updating service in synchronous mode for all integrated entities, guaranteeing the updating of amounts
